text: @realDonaldTrump You are such a damn liar, always trying to pat yourself on the back for something you didn’t do, why don’t you fucking try to cure the coronavirus dumb ass and stop worrying about what the hell everyone else is doing because you’re doing a fairly poor job yourself.
